suite.name: Robot Player

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Switch Browser
kw.doc: Switches between active browsers using ``index_or_alias``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

arguments.arg: css:body > div > span > div > span > div.online > div:nth-child(4)

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Exit For Loop If
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing for loop if the ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Continue For Loop If
kw.doc: Skips the current for loop iteration if the ``condition`` is true.
kw.msg: Continuing for loop from the next iteration.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Convert To String

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

suite.doc: Robot playing Findpairs memory card game. This robot assumes that Findpairs Users contains Sanni.
